title: Cradle Assemblies - Installation

body.body: Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle Including locking devices
Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Note to be used in service manual with stabilise warning
Renew locking devices where specified, refer to
Before tightening a fixing using a crow foot spanner adapter, refer to
Use of Crow Foot Spanner Adapters with Torque Wrenches
Observe all torque wrench tightening procedures, refer to
Position the cradle assembly to the frame, ensure the lower mounting of the radiator is attached to the cradle assembly.
Fit the nut and bolt securing the cradle assembly to the headstock, do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the crankcase front mounting nuts and bolts, do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the cradle assembly rear mounting bolt and nut, do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the nut and bolt to secure the exhaust intermediate pipe to the cradle assembly. Do not fully tighten at this stage.

body.name: RH exh intermediate pipe to cradle assembly cjeg

body.body: When tightening the cradle assembly mounting bolts and nuts, hold the nut and torque the bolt.
Tighten the cradle assembly to headstock bolt to
Tighten the cradle assembly rear mounting bolt to
Tighten cradle assembly to crankcase bolts to
Fit the cradle assembly two rear mounting bolts and nut plate, do not fully tighten at this stage.
When tightening the cradle assembly mounting bolts and nuts, hold the nut and torque the bolt.
Tighten the cradle assembly to headstock bolt to
Tighten the cradle assembly rear mounting bolts to
Tighten the engine mounting bracket bolts to
Tighten cradle assembly to crankcase bolt to
Fit the horn to the cradle arm and tighten its fixing to
. Connect the two wires to the horn.
Reattach the coolant expansion tank hose to the left hand cradle and secure with the two retaining clips.
Refit the clips for the clutch cable and horn harness to the cradle assembly.
Route the side stand switch harness to the left hand side of the airbox as noted for removal. Connect the electrical connector to the main harness.

search: Cradle Assemblies - Installation
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Renew locking devices where specified, refer to
Fixings
Before tightening a fixing using a crow foot spanner adapter, refer to
Use of Crow Foot Spanner Adapters with Torque Wrenches
Observe all torque wrench tightening procedures, refer to
Tightening Procedures
Position the cradle assembly to the frame, ensure the lower mounting of the radiator is attached to the cradle assembly.
Fit the nut and bolt securing the cradle assembly to the headstock, do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the crankcase front mounting nuts and bolts, do not fully tighten at this stage.
Right Hand Cradle Assembly
Fit the cradle assembly rear mounting bolt and nut, do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the nut and bolt to secure the exhaust intermediate pipe to the cradle assembly. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Bolt
Intermediate exhaust pipe
Bolt
Cradle assembly
When tightening the cradle assembly mounting bolts and nuts, hold the nut and torque the bolt.
Tighten the cradle assembly to headstock bolt to
40 Nm
Tighten the cradle assembly rear mounting bolt to
40 Nm
Tighten cradle assembly to crankcase bolts to
105 Nm
Left Hand Cradle Assembly
Fit the cradle assembly two rear mounting bolts and nut plate, do not fully tighten at this stage.
Mounting bolts
When tightening the cradle assembly mounting bolts and nuts, hold the nut and torque the bolt.
Tighten the cradle assembly to headstock bolt to
40 Nm
Tighten the cradle assembly rear mounting bolts to
40 Nm
Tighten the engine mounting bracket bolts to
25 Nm
Tighten cradle assembly to crankcase bolt to
105 Nm
Fit the horn to the cradle arm and tighten its fixing to
24 Nm
. Connect the two wires to the horn.
Reattach the coolant expansion tank hose to the left hand cradle and secure with the two retaining clips.
Retaining clips
Radiator lower mounting
Coolant expansion tank hose
Refit the clips for the clutch cable and horn harness to the cradle assembly.
Route the side stand switch harness to the left hand side of the airbox as noted for removal. Connect the electrical connector to the main harness.
Perform the following operations:
Side Stand - Installation
Sump Guard - Installation

Battery - Installation
